title: Spending
text:
Here you can see the expenditures of political parties in the lead-up to the elections according to the latest data.

28 okt - 26 nov 202320 nov - 26 nov 2023


During this period, political parties spent a total of ₹10,496,552 and displayed 10257 advertisements on Meta.
